description:
Ultra-distance runs demand ultra-comfortable shoes. Scarpa Spin Ultra trail running shoes have more cushion than other shoes in their trail line to keep your feet happy on high-mileage days. The Sock-Fit™ upper keeps you locked in, and the TPU insert holds you stable on uneven terrain. Grippy rubber soles provides reliable traction wherever your run takes you.

  • Mesh upper is highly breathable with micro-nubuck overlay for durability
  • Sock-Fit™ construction provides a snug and secure fit
  • TPU toe cap protects toes from bumps
  • EVA midsole for cushion and energy return
  • Anti-torsion TPU insert stabilizes feet
  • Vibram® MegaGrip Litebase for lightweight grip on wet and dry surfaces
  • 4mm studs give you traction in loose terrain
name: Scarpa Spin Ultra Trail Running Shoes - Men's
